alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ellis County through 900 PM CDT... At 822 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Natoma, or 10 miles north of Emmeram, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Ellis County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
